text: Luis Alberto Otárola Peñaranda (born 12 February 1967) is a Peruvian attorney and politician who was the Prime Minister of Peru from 2022 until his resignation in 2024. Before, he was the Minister of Defense twice, from 2011 to 2012 and again for a few days in December 2022. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Peru
title: Alberto Otárola
